mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE ( free_no, m_no, free_title, free_content, free_category, free_date, free_views, free_tag1, free_tag2, free_tag3, free_blind, free_comment_count ) VALUES ( free_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mNo}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, #{freeCategory}, SYSDATE, 0, #{freeTag1}, #{freeTag2}, #{freeTag3}, 'N', 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT f.free_no AS freeNo, f.free_title AS freeTitle, m.m_nickname AS nickname, f.free_content AS freeContent, f.free_date AS freeDate, f.free_views AS freeViews, f.free_tag1 AS freeTag1, f.free_tag2 AS freeTag2, f.free_tag3 AS freeTag3, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_comment WHERE free_no = f.free_no) AS commentCount FROM FREE f JOIN member m ON f.m_no = m.m_no WHERE f.free_no = #{freeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE SET free_title = #{freeTitle}, free_content = #{freeContent}, free_category = #{freeCategory}, free_tag1 = #{freeTag1}, free_tag2 = #{freeTag2}, free_tag3 = #{freeTag3}, free_update_date = SYSDATE WHERE free_no = #{freeNo}
UPDATE FREE SET free_views = free_views + 1 WHERE free_no = #{freeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE WHERE FREE_CATEGORY = #{categoryName}

SELECT f.*, member.m_nickname AS nickname, COUNT(free_comment.free_comment_no) AS commentCount FROM FREE f JOIN member ON f.m_no = member.m_no LEFT JOIN free_comment ON f.free_no = free_comment.free_no WHERE f.FREE_CATEGORY = #{categoryName} GROUP BY f.free_no HAVING row_number() over (order by f.FREE_DATE DESC) between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{startIndex} + #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, m.m_nickname, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_comment WHERE free_no = f.free_no), 0) AS commentCount, row_number() over (order by f.FREE_DATE DESC) rnum FROM FREE f JOIN member m ON f.m_no = m.m_no WHERE f.free_title LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR f.free_content LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) temp WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startIndex} AND #{endIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE WHERE FREE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%' OR FREE_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, m.M_NICKNAME AS nickname, row_number() over (order by f.FREE_DATE DESC) rnum FROM FREE f JOIN MEMBER m ON f.M_NO = m.M_NO ) WHERE rnum between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{startIndex} + #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, member.m_nickname AS nickname, COALESCE(fc.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount, row_number() over (order by f.FREE_DATE DESC) rnum FROM FREE f JOIN member ON f.m_no = member.m_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT free_no, COUNT(*) as commentCount FROM free_comment GROUP BY free_no ) fc ON f.free_no = fc.free_no WHERE f.FREE_CATEGORY = #{categoryName} ) WHERE rnum between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{startIndex} + #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, member.m_nickname AS nickname, COALESCE(fc.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount, row_number() over (order by COALESCE(fc.commentCount, 0) DESC) rnum FROM FREE f JOIN member ON f.m_no = member.m_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT free_no, COUNT(*) as commentCount FROM free_comment GROUP BY free_no ) fc ON f.free_no = fc.free_no WHERE f.FREE_CATEGORY = #{categoryName} ) WHERE rnum between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{startIndex} + #{pageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.*, member.m_nickname AS nickname, COALESCE(fc.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount, row_number() over (order by f.FREE_VIEWS DESC) rnum FROM FREE f JOIN member ON f.m_no = member.m_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT free_no, COUNT(*) as commentCount FROM free_comment GROUP BY free_no ) fc ON f.free_no = fc.free_no WHERE f.FREE_CATEGORY = #{categoryName} ) WHERE rnum between #{startIndex} + 1 and #{startIndex} + #{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM FREE WHERE m_no = #{mNo} ORDER BY info_no DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE WHERE m_no = #{mNo}
